forum.content:
各位晚上好~
今天的更新呢~
出了陣營領袖的評價系統，
詳細的地方如圖片所示。

而不同的陣營對不同的寶可夢有不同的評價
國外的鄉民也很厲害的整理出來了
如以下所示：

Blanche(急凍鳥)陣營
IV0%~49%：Overall, your XXX is not likely to make much headway in battle.
IV51%~64%：Overall, your XXX is above average.
IV67%~80%：Overall, your XXX has certainly caught my attention.
IV82%~100%：Overall, your XXX is a wonder! What a breathtaking Pokemon!

Candela(火焰鳥)陣營
IV0%~49%：Overall, your XXX may not be great in battle,but I still like it!
IV51%~64%：Overall, your XXX is a decent Pokemon
IV67%~80%：Overall, your XXX is a strong Pokemon. You should be proud!
IV82%~100%：Overall, your XXX simply amazes me. It can accomplish anything!

Spark(閃電鳥)陣營
IV0%~49%：Overall, your XXX has room for improvement as far as battling goes.
IV51%~64%：Overall, your XXX is pretty decent!
IV67%~80%：Overall, your XXX is really strong!
IV82%~100%：Overall, your XXX looks like it can really battle with the best of them!


也就是說如果你的寶可夢個體值是92%，而你的陣營是藍隊
那你按下APPAISE之後
就會出現Overall, your XXX is a wonder! What a breathtaking Pokemon!的評價
希望有幫助到大家
以上です
forum.title: 2分鐘教你了解寵物的評價
